@Satamon, you're either a fine troll or a fucking dumbass. The so called "private companies" you're talking about don't give a flying fuck about their userbase, they care about capital and profit. Some are ran by SJW's and they are retarded to a point where they don't see the bigger picture. But the bigger issue here is that most of these companies are located in California which has one of the most strict laws in regards to this content, and companies can be liable and responsible for the content on their platforms. There are cases of entire countries as well, like UK, CA, AU, NZ,... But there are plenty more countries where such content is perfectly legal and not problematic at all, and those are the countries where new servers and platforms will pop up. Where there is demand, there will be the supply, one way or another...
No matter what they do, Internet is a place where laws don't have any effect on, in the darkness deep below ...
